name: The Viridiscent Hunt

refinement_effect.refine_one: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 40% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 14s.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 50% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 13s.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 60% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 12s.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 70% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 11s.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Upon hit, Normal and Aimed Shot Attacks have a 50% chance to generate a Cyclone, which will continuously attract surrounding enemies, dealing 80% of ATK as DMG to these enemies every 0.5s for 4s. This effect can only occur once every 10s.

description: A pure green hunting bow. This once belonged to a certain hunter whose home was the forest.
